Package spring.model

Class Idea

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.model.Idea
  • @Entity
public class Idea
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a user's idea.
    Author:
    Shane Lockwood

      void setTitle​(java.lang.String title)

      • Idea

        public Idea​(java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String description,
            User poster,
            java.util.GregorianCalendar datePosted)
        Construct an Idea.
        Parameters:
        title - The String representing the title of the idea.
        description - The String representing the description of the idea.
        poster - The User representing the poster of the idea.
        datePosted - The GregorianCalendar representing the time the idea was created.

      • addVote

        public void addVote​(IdeaVote vote)
        Appends the vote to the List of previous votes. If a vote mapped to the same Idea and User exists, the existing vote is modified.
        Parameters:
        vote - IdeaVote

      • voteCount

        public int voteCount()
        Returns the sum of mapped votes with a true upVote subtracted by the sum of mapped votes with a false upVote.
        Returns:
        int.

      • getDevelopments

        public java.util.Set<Development> getDevelopments()
        Returns the mapped developments.
        Returns:
        Set<Development>

      • addDevelopment

        public void addDevelopment​(Development development)
        Appends the Development to the List of previous developments. If a Development mapped to the same User exists, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        development - The Development to append.

      • getComments

        public java.util.Set<Comment> getComments()
        Returns the mapped Comments.
        Returns:
        Set<Comment>

      • addComment

        public void addComment​(Comment comment)
        Appends the Comment to the List of previous comments.
        Parameters:
        comment - The Comment to append.
